body:
Almost everytime i log onto avicus it crashes, its not the type of crash that everyone else was experiencing, its a different type. What happens is that i sometimes am able to do something for 2 seconds (legit) and then minecraft just stops and crashes in a sec. this is only for avicus and nothing else on my computer randomely does this. t Please help because i cant play much on avicus, and when it does work, after a while (a few hours) it starts crashing agian D: please help
the problem details are:


http://pastebin.com/puc7V5uU
[REDACTED]
Mod's comments: The OP was too long with useless code. Please use pastebin instead. I'm nice, therefore I've already done it for you.

replies.body: Guys can you please help me, I love to play on Avicus and this is my favorite server. Please help me so I can start playing more again, it's a terrible feeling when I see my friends playing, but when I try to log on, it crashes. Please, Please, Please, I am begging for someone to please help me fix this problem.

Please help me so I can start playing more again, it's a terrible feeling when I see my friends playing, but when I try to log on, it crashes. Please, Please, Please, I am begging for someone to please help me fix this problem.

replies.body: how do i see if i have any mods? i havent ever downloaded any. Does Optifine count?
replies.body_tagged: how do i see if i have any mods? i havent ever downloaded any. Does Optifine count?

replies.body:
mods shouldn't effect it, since you can connect to other servers, unless its a hacking client of some sort... which I don't believe you would use...
make sure ur using minecraft 1.7.9(optifine if u want), if it still doesnt work, try deleting the version and re-running the minecraft launcher to have it re-install the specific version, and add optifine after(if u want)
P.S if that doesn't work, could u also paste the logs into pastebin? I'm not so good at reading crash reports D:
